extracted_playbook.title: Identify GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the current version of GitLab Community Edition (CE) or GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE) installed.

extracted_playbook.title: Update GitLab to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update GitLab installations to the latest version as per vendor instructions to mitigate vulnerabilities.

affected_products: GitLab Community Edition (CE) and GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE) versions prior to 16.7.7
GitLab Community Edition (CE) and GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE) versions 16.8.x prior to 16.8.4
GitLab Community Edition (CE) and GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE) versions 16.9.x prior to 16.9.2
